resources.string: Please enter your Email and Password.

The App uses TensorFlow Lite to identify seeds using machine learning and real time image recognition.
 Its is a lightweight machine learning model specializing in keeping operations on the device rather than offloading the image processing to a server network.
 Instead TensorFlow Lite allows us to create a neural network for our app that can recognize images almost instantly.
 Currently, the model has been trained on 100 images each of three separate seeds as a proof of concept. This can be scalable to much larger datasets for an exponentially larger number of seeds while the model, per TensorFlowâ€™s design, will not grow significantly larger than a megabyte. This allows for both regular updates, modifications, and additions for our app post launch.
